title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning         Fern Lake as seen from the Pinnacle Overlook NPS Photo  Land surrounding Fern Lake has recently been acquired as part of the Fern Lake Conservation and Recreation Act. This new acquisition will protect the Fern Lake watershed and maintain the viewshed as seen from the Pinnacle Overlook. more...           .         Wilderness Road Campground Wastewater System Component and Repair Campground Road - Environemental Assessment Work on this project was completed in the spring of 2012. For more information please call (606) 248-2817.           General Management Plan Summary General Management Plan Chapters 1-6, References and Glossary General Management Plan Appendices Signed Record of Decision
